description: Sam: "Don't worry! We'll have you out soon. I've got all your questions memorized. You'll need to find a big blue thing.. we're not sure what it is but be careful! Although it feels like everything here is kind of just.. surviving... like you!"
Oh we have jokes now... I'll find it.
Sam: "Good! Cause if you don't, you're stuck."
Not the most desirable place to be... the air is thick here and nothing feels like it's wants to be here. So I think I'll pass on being stuck.
